ygData.subject: Re: New to this list  **  Possible Spoiler **
ygData.msgSnippet: Runes required for the Pillar of Fire Spell: Rune of Proximity Rune of Nagafen Aljernon 14th Level Wizard Karana ... From: daverobinson@home.com
ygData.messageBody:
Runes required for the Pillar of Fire Spell:
Rune of Proximity
Rune of Nagafen

Aljernon
14th Level Wizard
Karana


-----Original Message-----
From: daverobinson@... [mailto:daverobinson@...]
Sent: Saturday, May 08, 1999 1:00 AM
To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_spell_research] New to this list


From: daverobinson@...

Hello all
First I will intrduce myself
My name is Heden I am a lvl 15 mage from Erudin
hmmmm well that is about it :)

I have looked at a few of your emails and you
talk about different langs, first how do you tell
what lang your book is in.

Also, I have recently been the lucky one to find
a Rune of Proximity. Why this is lucky, well I don't know
as I am not sure what class this rune is for.

Thanks for you help, and as I learn i will pass the
info on to you

Thanks
David Robinson
aka Heden
